## Data

```{r}


states <- st_read("F:/datasets/uscensus/cb_2017_us_state_5m/cb_2017_us_state_5m.shp")



```

```{r}
glimpse(states)
```

```{r}
levels(states$NAME)
```


```{r}
contig_48 <- subset(states, !(NAME %in% c("Alaska", "Hawaii", "Puerto Rico", "American Samoa", "United States Virgin Islands", "Guam", "Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands")))
```


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
plot(contig_48$geometry)
```
